info.title: SP Spid
info.description: SPID gateway. API to easly work with SPID

get.description: Encode a jwt token specifying a token type as in jwt.token_type table
get.summary: Encode a jwt token of type specified

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: token type. jwt1: Default jwt type, jwt2: Generic saml assertions token, jwt1_es256: jwt ECDSA 256 asymmetric keys

get.description: Get provider metadat stored in saml.metadata table

parameters.name: cod_prvd
parameters.description: Provider code. To get provider codes use /api/prvd service.

post.summary: verify metadata signature and xml schema

parameters.name: cod_prvd
parameters.description: Provider code. To get provider codes use /api/prvd service.

404.description: no sp found to verify metadata

get.summary: build service provider meta data based on settings in saml.settings table and saml.signature data

parameters.name: cod_prvd
parameters.description: Service provider code. To get provider codes use /api/prvd service.

get.summary: get list of providers in saml.providers table
